ratings.comment: Midterm was nothing from the lectures, he tested us on actual quotes and who said it. Lectures were unorganized, went from one idea to another, went on tangents. Final was more focused on lecture. papers were what saved my grade.

Professor was fine, but lectures were disorganized and lecture slides did not give any information. Lectures aren't mandatory, but if you don't go you won't learn anything. There are 3-4 big writing assignments (about 10 pages), so if you don't like writing and this class isn't mandatory - don't take it. The discussions are mandatory and helpful.

COM ARTS 250 is a class I'd never recommend as long as Camilo is teaching it. The required discussion sections were lead by TA's once a week and were by far much more helpful than the actual professor was.  Camilo used slides that did not help with his lecture and gets very distracted and uses unnecessarily large vocabulary that muddles the content
